name: Drakenlords: CCG Card Duels
summary:
Drakenlords is a fantasy CCG, released on iOS and Android on 23rd November 2016.

The game features two real-time competitive modes (constructed ranked ladder and sealed-deck arena) and a long single player campaign. Matches typically last 6 to 8 minutes. Players can unlock and play up to 6 different warlords, and build their deck from a pool of over 300 collectable cards.
